Free AI Builders:What's the Catch?

The honest truth about "free" AI website builders.

The Catch: Nothing is Truly Free

ðŸš¨ Reality Check

Every "free" AI builder limits you to force an upgrade. The free tier is a trial, not a product.

5 Common "Catches"

1. Builder Branding

Free sites show "Made with X" badges. You can't remove them without paying. Looks unprofessional.

2. Subdomain Only

yoursite.builder.com - not yoursite.com. Custom domain requires paid plan.

3. Feature Limits

Limited pages (3-10), storage (100MB-1GB), bandwidth. Hit ceiling quickly.

4. No Code Export

If you leave, you lose everything. Free tier is vendor lock-in.

5. Support Gated

Email support? Priority help? Those are paid features. Free users wait days.

Free Tier Comparison

BuilderFree PagesStorageCustom Domain
